entry.title: About
entry.summary:
Welcome to my portfolio/CV site. I’m a Software Engineer working in telematics. I dabble in C and Python mostly but I’ve recently gotten acquianted with JS.

I also dabble a bit in machine learning and web development. I’ll probably upload those projects at some later point â€¦
entry.content:
Welcome to my portfolio/CV site. I’m a Software Engineer working in telematics. I dabble in C and Python mostly but I’ve recently gotten acquianted with JS.

I also dabble a bit in machine learning and web development. I’ll probably upload those projects at some later point in time. Check out my CV in the Curriculum Vitate section.
